description: Bakthat is a MIT licensed backup framework written in Python, its both a command line tool and a Python module that helps you manage backups on Amaon S3Glacier and OpenStack Swift. It automatically compress, encrypt (symmetric encryption) and upload your files.

info.Keywords:: aws s3 glacier backup restore archive

longdescription: Bakthat is a MIT licensed backup framework written in Python, its both a command line tool and a Python module that helps you manage backups on Amaon S3Glacier and OpenStack Swift. It automatically compress, encrypt (symmetric encryption) and upload your files.
